resources.string: Check out AI Dental Notes - A revolutionary dental scribe app!
AI Dental Notes helps dental professionals create SOAP notes from voice recordings.
Microphone access is needed to record dental appointments for transcription.
Internet access is required to process recordings and generate dental notes.
AI-powered dental scribe that generates SOAP notes from dentist-patient conversations.

AI Dental Notes is a revolutionary dental scribe application for healthcare professionals. The app uses artificial intelligence to transform dentist-patient conversations into comprehensive SOAP notes, saving valuable time and improving documentation quality.

Key Features:
• Voice recording and accurate transcription
• AI-powered SOAP note generation
• Dental terminology recognition
• HIPAA-compliant storage
• Mobile access for busy practitioners
• Simple, intuitive interface
• ICD-10 code suggestions

Designed by dental professionals for dental professionals, AI Dental Notes helps you focus on patient care instead of paperwork.
